Hi all,
  I am trying to compile and build a basic demo program (demo.cpp)
=
using visual studio.net (2003) and cantera 1.5.5. I am having linking
error=
s and these are the messages thrown by vc++:

LINK : error LNK2020: unresol=
ved token (0A000074) Cantera.ChemEquil.__dtor
LINK : error LNK2020: unresol=
ved token (0A000080)
Cantera.Constituents.__dtor
LINK : error LNK2020: unre=
solved token (0A000082)
Cantera.ReactionStoichMgr.__dtor
LINK : error LNK20=
20: unresolved token (0A000090) Cantera.State.__dtor
LINK : error LNK2020: =
unresolved token (0A000094)
?__factory@FalloffFactory@Cantera@@0PAV12@A
LIN=
K : error LNK2020: unresolved token (0A000098) ct.ctvector_int.__dtor
LINK =
: error LNK2020: unresolved token (0A00009B) ct.ctvector_fp.__dtor
LINK : f=
atal error LNK1120: 7 unresolved externals

 I would be really glad if some=
one could help me out. I have done all
the following steps:
1.changed optio=
ns to multithread dll.
2.added include libraries in project settings.
3.add=
ed lib folder from cantera in the additional link library folder.
4.added m=
svcp71.dll, msvcr71.dll and clib.dll to the windows/system 
folder.
5.inclu=
ded all header files in my code(cantera,equilibrium,gri30.h etc..)

Are the=
re any more things i need to do or is there any mistake in what
i have done=
 so far?
